SELECT IFNULL(t.commodityId,'')commodityId,IFNULL(t.commodityNo,'')commodityNo, IFNULL(t.commodityName,'')commodityName,IFNULL(t.unit,'')unit, IFNULL(SUM(t.commodityNum),'') saleNum, IFNULL(SUM(t.totalPrice),'') totalPrice, IFNULL(SUM(t.inPrice * t.commodityNum),'') totalInPrice FROM t_order_detail t RIGHT JOIN t_order o ON t.orderNumber=o.orderNumber where 1=1 AND o.orderStatus!=1 AND o.status=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( t.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityName}),'%') OR t.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityName}),'%') )
GROUP BY t.commodityId,t.commodityNo,t.commodityName,t.unit
